  • titan_pylib.data_structures.union_find.union_find_heavy

titan_pylib.data_structures.union_find.union_find_heavy のソースコード

  1from typing import Set, List
  2from collections import defaultdict
  3


[ドキュメント]
  4class UnionFindHeavy():
  5
  6  def __init__(self, n: int) -> None:
  7    self._n: int = n
  8    self._group_numbers: int = n
  9    self._parents: List[int] = [-1] * n  # defaultdict(lambda: -1)
 10    # self._roots = set(range(n))
 11    self._edges: List[int] = [0] * n
 12    self._G: List[List[int]] = [[] for _ in range(n)]
 13


[ドキュメント]
 14  def root(self, x: int) -> int:
 15    assert 0 <= x < self._n, f'{self.__class__.__name__}.root(x) IndexError, x={x}'
 16    a = x
 17    while self._parents[a] >= 0:
 18      a = self._parents[a]
 19    # return a  # not compressing path.
 20    while self._parents[x] >= 0:
 21      y = x
 22      x = self._parents[x]
 23      self._parents[y] = a
 24    return a


 25


[ドキュメント]
 26  def unite(self, x: int, y: int) -> bool:
 27    assert 0 <= x < self._n and 0 <= y < self._n, \
 28        f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.unite({x}, {y})'
 29    x = self.root(x)
 30    y = self.root(y)
 31    self._edges[x] += 1
 32    self._edges[y] += 1
 33    if x == y: return False
 34    self._G[x].append(y)
 35    self._G[y].append(x)
 36    self._group_numbers -= 1
 37    if self._parents[x] > self._parents[y]:
 38      x, y = y, x
 39    self._parents[x] += self._parents[y]
 40    self._parents[y] = x
 41    # self._roots.discard(y)
 42    return True


 43


[ドキュメント]
 44  def get_edges(self, x: int) -> int:
 45    return self._edges[self.root(x)]


 46
 47  # x -> y


[ドキュメント]
 48  def unite_right(self, x: int, y: int) -> int:
 49    assert 0 <= x < self._n and 0 <= y < self._n, \
 50        f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.unite_right(x: int, y: int), x={x}, y={y}'
 51    x = self.root(x)
 52    y = self.root(y)
 53    if x == y: return x
 54    self._G[x].append(y)
 55    self._G[y].append(x)
 56    self._group_numbers -= 1
 57    self._parents[y] += self._parents[x]
 58    self._parents[x] = y
 59    # self._roots.discard(y)
 60    return y


 61
 62  # x <- y


[ドキュメント]
 63  def unite_left(self, x: int, y: int) -> int:
 64    assert 0 <= x < self._n and 0 <= y < self._n, \
 65        f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.unite_left(x: int, y: int), x={x}, y={y}'
 66    x = self.root(x)
 67    y = self.root(y)
 68    if x == y: return x
 69    self._G[x].append(y)
 70    self._G[y].append(x)
 71    self._group_numbers -= 1
 72    self._parents[x] += self._parents[y]
 73    self._parents[y] = x
 74    # self._roots.discard(y)
 75    return x


 76


[ドキュメント]
 77  def size(self, x: int) -> int:
 78    assert 0 <= x < self._n, \
 79        f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.size(x: int), x={x}'
 80    return -self._parents[self.root(x)]


 81


[ドキュメント]
 82  def same(self, x: int, y: int) -> bool:
 83    assert 0 <= x < self._n and 0 <= y < self._n, \
 84        f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.same(x: int, y: int), x={x}, y={y}'
 85    return self.root(x) == self.root(y)


 86


[ドキュメント]
 87  def members(self, x: int) -> Set[int]:
 88    assert 0 <= x < self._n, \
 89        f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.members(x: int), x={x}'
 90    seen = set([x])
 91    todo = [x]
 92    while todo:
 93      v = todo.pop()
 94      for x in self._G[v]:
 95        if x in seen: continue
 96        todo.append(x)
 97        seen.add(x)
 98    return seen


 99


[ドキュメント]
100  def all_roots(self) -> List[int]:
101    '''Return all roots. / O(1)'''
102    # return self._roots
103    return [i for i, x in enumerate(self._parents) if x < 0]


104


[ドキュメント]
105  def group_count(self) -> int:
106    return self._group_numbers


107


[ドキュメント]
108  def all_group_members(self) -> defaultdict:
109    group_members = defaultdict(list)
110    for member in range(self._n):
111      group_members[self.root(member)].append(member)
112    return group_members


113


[ドキュメント]
114  def clear(self) -> None:
115    self._group_numbers = self._n
116    for i in range(self._n):
117      self._parents[i] = -1
118      self._G[i].clear()


119
120  def __str__(self) -> str:
121    return f'<{self.__class__.__name__}> [\n' + '\n'.join(f'  {k}: {v}' for k, v in self.all_group_members().items()) + '\n]'
